title: The Most Charming and Attractive | ROMANTIC COMEDY

sources.title: The Most Charming and Attractive | ROMANTIC COMEDY
sources.description:
Nadya Klyueva, a very nice employee of one research institute cannot arrange her personal life. She is more than thirty years old, and still unmarried. Occasionally, she meets her former schoolmate Susanna in a bus. 

After that Nadya's life begins to change. Susanna is a professional sociologist and gives Nadya practical advice on how to change her behaviour and clothing to get married successfully. The object of Nadya's courtship is her colleague Volodya, frivolous "Don Juan". But soon Nadya realises that her happiness and love that she sought through a variety of tricks and efforts is just an illusion. 

Year of production: 1985

Directed by: Bezhanov Gerald
Writed by: Eyramjan Anatoly, Bezhanov Gerald
Music: Rubashevsky Vladimir
Operator: Piganov Valentin
Production Designer: Evgeniy Vinitsky

Starting: Lyubov Sokolova, Leonid Kuravlev, Tatyana Vasilyeva, Alexander Shirvindt, Lyudmila Ivanova, Alexander Abdulov, Vladimir Nosik, Lev Perfilov, Mikhail Kokshenov, Irina Muravyova, Larisa Udovichenko, Vladimir Rubashevsky
